title: 15 MIN FULL BODY STRETCH - For Rest Day, Improve Mobility & Flexibility, Follow Along Style
description:
Stretch and recover with this follow along 15 min Full Body Stretch. We need to remember to recharge our bodies and mind, because it's so important if we want to keep growing! I hope you enjoy this, and feel grateful for your beautiful body ♡ 

📱 My workout APP has a new design and lots of exclusive workouts, sign up to my Grow with Anna APP today: https://www.growwithanna.com/

▸ Focus: Recovery & Mobility
▸ Time: 15 Minutes
▸ No Equipment
▸ 50 sec on, 10 sec off to change to the next stretch 

Please remember that we are all different and that you can make this your own workout ♡ Take a longer break when you need to.

♡ Sign up to the Team Grow Newsletter: https://manage.kmail-lists.com/subscriptions/subscribe?a=VLsDDa&g=WikyFT

channelDescription:
Get strong, fit & confident with my at home workouts. Welcome to my channel!
I used to be a certified CrossFit coach and now I inspire and motivate people all over the world on my Social Media Channels. 

What you'll find here : Full Length Workout Videos, HIIT and Strength Workouts, oh and lots of good, positive vibes ;)

Make sure you subscribe + turn notifications on so you never miss a strong workout with me and my Team Grow.
See you on the mat! Anna xx

comments: I took 2 weeks off from ur workouts cause I was EXTREMLY filled with exams, like I would study 24/7, now when most of my final exams are over, i finally have time again!! See you on the mat. 💯💥

I was always insecure about my self cuz my classmates always body shamed me because a was a little chubbier than them but I don’t know how doing these exercises and stretching makes me forget the insecurity and develops my self esteem and makes me love my self more and more ❤

Here for anyone who needs it:

1. Hip rotations
2. Butterfly stretch
3. Lunge + push knee out (right)
4. Pigeon pose (right)
5. Lunge + push knee out (left)
6. Pigeon pose (left)
7. Downward dog
8. Hamstring stretch (right)
9. Hamstring stretch (left)
10. Cobra ab stretch
11. Quad stretch (right)
12. Quad stretch (left)
13. Camel stretch
14. Forward fold
15. Chest opener

😄 have a great day ❤️

edit: stop replying pls :(

I’ve done this full body stretch for one month straight and let me say omggg!!! The improvement in my flexibility is insane !! This is coming from someone who’s had stiff joins due to an illness, but I’ve healed and this after my exercise was just everything ! It calmed down my body ( Inhale w ur nose and exhale w ur mouth for better breathing ) and like I can literally move my body around so freely! Like ofc at the beginning it was hard to hold but after consistency it became a breeze ! And I’ve got to say I have less joint pains, back aches are gone and my posture is wayyy better. Thank you so much for this amazing stretch!
I totally recommend it to others because it’s just so lovely to end your workouts with ❤.

Liebe Anna, vor 1 Jahr habe ich angefangen Dir zu folgen und bin mit 58 Jahren fitter als je zuvor in meinem Leben!
Bitte mehr Video without jumping!
Danke , Danke ,Danke !!!
